item.title: Premature abstraction
item.description: TL;DR - Stick to something like the rule of three. Premature abstraction in a any system is almost always going to be problematic, expensive and frustrating. Never add abstractions because you “might” need it in the future. Add it when you “really” need it Abstraction is a good way of hiding complexity. In your software development life, you probably have created well rounded abstractions that made your life easier.
